Class ServletServerFactory

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JettyFactory, TomcatFactory, UndertowFactory

    public abstract class ServletServerFactory
extends io.micronaut.http.ssl.SslBuilder<javax.net.ssl.SSLContext>
